author: michaelwassmer
body:
#### PR description:

With this PR, old and unused MET configs are removed. The PR is linked to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33406 where it was decided to remove them.  

#### PR validation:

- [x] `scram b code-checks`
- [x] `scram b code-format`
- [x] `scram b runtests`
- [x] `runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos` worked with the exception of two workflows, however the crashes seemed independent of the changes here
title: removed old and unused configs linked to reco muon duplicate mitigation
